author: sky.cactus
content: Another 1559 PR that has been sitting for a while... https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3231

author: abdel.stark
content: I saw it was approved this is why i did nothing

author: abdel.stark
content: It was not approved by any author ?

author: sky.cactus
content: To auto-merge an author needs to approve.

author: abdel.stark
content: Ok, there is a label to quickly filter what's need a review from an author, right ? Was it used on that one ?

author: abdel.stark
content: My mental filter was to look at PRs without approvals, but it is not good actually

author: sky.cactus
content: `is:pr is:open mention:@me` in the PR search filter if you want.  The bot will mention you (and all other authors).  Alternatively, ensure your GitHub notifications are setup so you get an email when you are mentioned.

author: sky.cactus
content: That filter isn't perfect, since it includes PRs where you are mentioned by not-the-bot, but it gets close.
